data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Satara that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Satara, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,934,214, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Satara, Maharashtra, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Satara. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kunbi Konkani people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kunbi Konkani people know you.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Satara. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Satara, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Satara, Maharashtra, India has a population of 3,003,700.

We estimate Satara has 33,041 people who might know Jesus, 36,445 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,934,214 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 3,003,700 people living in Satara.
